如果宕机的slave对应的master只有一个slave的话
如果其他master有多的slave,则该master会分配一个slaveg给上面的master，确保每个master至少有一个slave


测试：

集群-192.168.109.129(192.168.109.129:7005)>cluster nodes
"921b4654ac3fc9896d924d77ce07460080bed3e8 192.168.109.129:7007@17007 slave 85ea491b4c5ac70ff8dc8bf285e9d98c3f93b88f 0 1601513051000 4 connected
71e2a7e9e7bf894f0187ffe07b42aad177c93cbd 192.168.109.130:7002@17002 slave 453a49faed9d4a90dd25cf1d85910ce2a5f4135c 0 1601513051678 5 connected
85ea491b4c5ac70ff8dc8bf285e9d98c3f93b88f 192.168.109.130:7001@17001 master - 0 1601513051000 4 connected 5461-10922
453a49faed9d4a90dd25cf1d85910ce2a5f4135c 192.168.109.129:7005@17005 myself,master - 0 1601513052000 2 connected 10923-16383
cb7e8cc1ea76a077f94c61407f49413f1b364019 192.168.109.129:7006@17006 slave 85ea491b4c5ac70ff8dc8bf285e9d98c3f93b88f 0 1601513053694 4 connected
5115170f054ffafa8186db9a24d9f6adcdf2d92e 192.168.109.129:7004@17004 slave,fail 69d9808f2bc97391e4babe8003ced43f0bdb4969 1601513036234 1601513035529 7 disconnected
69d9808f2bc97391e4babe8003ced43f0bdb4969 192.168.109.130:7003@17003 master - 0 1601513054705 7 connected 0-5460
"
集群-192.168.109.129(192.168.109.129:7005)>cluster nodes
"921b4654ac3fc9896d924d77ce07460080bed3e8 192.168.109.129:7007@17007 slave 69d9808f2bc97391e4babe8003ced43f0bdb4969 0 1601513060756 7 connected 被分配到69d9808f2bc97391e4babe8003ced43f0bdb4969这个master
71e2a7e9e7bf894f0187ffe07b42aad177c93cbd 192.168.109.130:7002@17002 slave 453a49faed9d4a90dd25cf1d85910ce2a5f4135c 0 1601513062775 5 connected
85ea491b4c5ac70ff8dc8bf285e9d98c3f93b88f 192.168.109.130:7001@17001 master - 0 1601513061000 4 connected 5461-10922
453a49faed9d4a90dd25cf1d85910ce2a5f4135c 192.168.109.129:7005@17005 myself,master - 0 1601513060000 2 connected 10923-16383
cb7e8cc1ea76a077f94c61407f49413f1b364019 192.168.109.129:7006@17006 slave 85ea491b4c5ac70ff8dc8bf285e9d98c3f93b88f 0 1601513060000 4 connected
5115170f054ffafa8186db9a24d9f6adcdf2d92e 192.168.109.129:7004@17004 slave,fail 69d9808f2bc97391e4babe8003ced43f0bdb4969 1601513036234 1601513035529 7 disconnected
69d9808f2bc97391e4babe8003ced43f0bdb4969 192.168.109.130:7003@17003 master - 0 1601513061766 7 connected 0-5460
"
